whitecat.core.agents
Interface MethodForwarderGenerator

All Known Implementing Classes:
LocalForwarderMethodGenerator
public interface MethodForwarderGenerator

The interface provides utility method for the generation of forwarders method, that are methods in the agent proxy that must forward request to the method on the role itself.

Author:
Luca Ferrari - cat4hire (at) sourceforge.net

Method Summary
 boolean bindReferences(AgentProxy proxy, IRole roleInstance)
          This method is called at the end of the generation of the new proxy instance.
 java.lang.String getMethodForwarderCode(javassist.CtMethod interfaceMethod)
          Generates source code for a method forwarder.
 void init(java.lang.String proxyClassName, java.lang.String roleClassName, java.lang.String key)
          Inits this method generator with the proxy class name it will be used onto and a key calculated from the role engine.
 

Method Detail

init

void init(java.lang.String proxyClassName,
          java.lang.String roleClassName,
          java.lang.String key)
Inits this method generator with the proxy class name it will be used onto and a key calculated from the role engine.

Parameters:
proxyClassName - the real (not manipulated) proxy class name used for the manipulations. It can be used to know properties of the proxy itself.
key - a key computed by the role engine during the manipulation, used as an identifier for the manipulation itself.
roleClassName - the name of the role class, used for knowing properties of the role itself

getMethodForwarderCode

java.lang.String getMethodForwarderCode(javassist.CtMethod interfaceMethod)
                                        throws WCForwarderMethodException
Generates source code for a method forwarder. Given a method in the interface, this method returns the source code that implements such method.

Parameters:
interfaceMethod - the source method from the role interface
Returns:
the code source for the method that implements the interface method one.
Throws:
WCForwarderMethodException - if something goes wrong

bindReferences

boolean bindReferences(AgentProxy proxy,
                       IRole roleInstance)
                       throws WCForwarderMethodException
This method is called at the end of the generation of the new proxy instance. Place in this method code that serves for binding parameters used for method forwarding calls to the role instance (for instance the binding of a key in the hashmap for the references).

Parameters:
roleInstance - the role reference (if available)
proxy - the agent proxy created from the manipulation
Returns:
true if the bind has been done
Throws:
WCForwarderMethodException - if something goes wrong
